name: Daily Token Usage Report
description: Generate daily token usage report with hourly breakdown and cost estimates

schedule.rationale: Evening report (8pm) provides full day's usage before end of day

payload.message:
@/home/ubuntu/clawd/tools/daily-token-report.py --send-telegram

Generate daily token usage report with hourly breakdown for last 24 hours. Send to Telegram.

configuration.schedule: Adjust 'tz' to your local timezone and 'expr' to preferred reporting time
configuration.delivery: Requires Telegram configured. Change 'channel' to 'discord', 'slack', etc. as needed
configuration.script: Requires daily-token-report.py script in tools directory (not included in this library)
configuration.customization: Modify script path and arguments to match your setup

notes: This job references a custom Python script not included in this library
You'll need to implement your own token tracking script or use OpenClaw's built-in session_status
Consider creating a simpler version using session_status tool instead of external script
